text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3cdcb090a664e182078f7cc0ca3e4e5a94bbb784|patch 8.2.0400: not all tests using a terminal are in the list of fla…>
patch 8.2.0400: not all tests using a terminal are in the list of flaky tests

Problem:    Not all tests using a terminal are in the list of flaky tests.
Solution:   Introduce the test_is_flaky flag.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0400: not all tests using a terminal are in the list of fla… · vim/vim@3cdcb09
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0400: not all tests using a terminal are in the list of fla… · vim/vim@3cdcb09
attachments.text: …ky tests Problem: Not all tests using a terminal are in the list of flaky tests. Solution: Introduce the test_is_flaky flag.

patch 8.2.0401: not enough test coverage for evalvars.c

Problem:    Not enough test coverage for evalvars.c.
Solution:   Add more tests. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5804)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/30d53e2c11e670845830bdfc29bf8c1615df61a8|patch 8.2.0402: setting local instead of global flag>
patch 8.2.0402: setting local instead of global flag

Problem:    Setting local instead of global flag.
Solution:   Prepend "g:" to "test_is_flaky".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0402: setting local instead of global flag · vim/vim@30d53e2
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0402: setting local instead of global flag · vim/vim@30d53e2
attachments.text: Problem: Setting local instead of global flag. Solution: Prepend "g:" to "test_is_flaky".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a3a9c8ef697bbf6f640cde99710b6f534f29f77d|patch 8.2.0403: when 'buftype' is "nofile" there is no overwrite check>
patch 8.2.0403: when 'buftype' is "nofile" there is no overwrite check

Problem:    When 'buftype' is "nofile" there is no overwrite check.
Solution:   Also check for existing file when 'buftype' is set.
            (closes #5807)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0403: when 'buftype' is "nofile" there is no overwrite check · vim/vim@a3a9c8e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0403: when 'buftype' is "nofile" there is no overwrite check · vim/vim@a3a9c8e
attachments.text: Problem: When 'buftype' is "nofile" there is no overwrite check. Solution: Also check for existing file when 'buftype' is set. (closes #5807)

Solution:   Add remark about first argument.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3fa5e1326290e181215f805db17793f42cf73079|patch 8.2.0405: MSVC: build fails with some combination of features>
patch 8.2.0405: MSVC: build fails with some combination of features

Problem:    MSVC: build fails with some combination of features.
Solution:   Enable CHANNEL if TERMINAL is enabled. (Mike Williams)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0405: MSVC: build fails with some combination of features · vim/vim@3fa5e13
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0405: MSVC: build fails with some combination of features · vim/vim@3fa5e13
attachments.text: Problem: MSVC: build fails with some combination of features. Solution: Enable CHANNEL if TERMINAL is enabled. (Mike Williams)

Solution:   Delete the file.  Also use Check commands.
